description: System-generated unique identifier for this line/category record; used as the primary key in the table.
Business code or name identifying the vehicle/asset line category used for classification and reporting.
Human-readable description of the line category for users, shown in screens and reports.
Optional free-text notes about the line category, policies, or usage; not used for system logic.
Timestamp when the record was last changed by any user or process.
Legacy timestamp of last update. Likely redundant with last_modified; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user or process that originally created the record.
Timestamp when the record was initially created.
Identifier of the user or process that most recently updated the record.
Timestamp of the most recent update per the user audit trail.
